titleInfo.title: Collapse of Isaac's Hardware Store in Leadville, Colorado

physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on envelope: "#164 Collapse of Isaac's Hardware Store, c 1907." Handwritten on back of photograph: "#164, 300 Harrison Ave. after building collapsed. (Building that housed Isaac's Hardware Store (3rd and W. Harrison)) c. 1907."

mods.abstract: A crowd of people is gathered around the remains of Hyman Isaac's Hardware Store, 3rd and W. Harrison, Leadville, Colorado. The building collapsed circa 1907.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
